name: Stripping Dungeons
description:
Stripping Dungeons - 2D Top-down game.

Clear the world from the dungeons from where the monsters come out. But know that the deeper you go, the harder it is.

You are a 20-year-old man, and in the world of Gorueya, everyone who turns 20 needs to become a warrior in order to protect their world from portals leading to dungeons where monsters live. If the dungeons are not destroyed, then monsters will come out of the portals and destroy the settlements.

You will find yourself on an island where there will be a portal to the dungeon, and since you turned 20, your goal is to stripping the dungeon
